metadata.description:
Provides assessment performance in rugby competition. Can be done on one's self, or athlete under observation. 

This template can be used by Athletic recruiters visiting a number of Athletes. 

This template can be used by a coach, asking his players to self assess after each game. 

Analytics in this case would be of huge value to teams, and recruiters.
metadata.name: Rugby Union Contest Self Assessment

responses.label: off your feet in the ruck

items.label: Audit
When was this game played?
Who was this game played against?
Preparation
Did you come prepared with all necessary gear for the competition?
Did you visualize doing the fundamentals successfully? Rucking, Tackling, Running
Did hydrate the day before and day of the game?
Did you have a good dinner the night before, and healthy light breakfast / lunch day of?
Did you get into the correct mindset the day before? Motivated, focused, ambitious, mean, confident
Did you get 2 conditioning sessions in the week of the game?
Did you get 2 strength sessions in the week of the game?
Preparation
Did you come prepared with all necessary gear for the competition?
Did you visualize doing the fundamentals successfully? Rucking, Tackling, Running
Did hydrate the day before and day of the game?
Did you have a good dinner the night before, and healthy light breakfast / lunch day of?
Did you get into the correct mindset the day before? Motivated, focused, ambitious, mean, confident
Did you get 2 conditioning sessions in the week of the game?
Did you get 2 strength sessions in the week of the game?
Offence
Did you keep you eyes up, to see the competition, and protect your neck while carrying the ball?
Did you run for the gaps between players when carrying the ball?
If you broke the line, did you look for support lines?
Did you avoid letting your running lines 'drift' outward?
Did you communicate loudly, clearly, consistently with your pod?
Around the Ruck
Did you do a squeeze ball whenever possible?
Did I allow any stolen ball when I was the primary support runner?
Describe what I can do to stop the stolen ball in the future?
Did I work to join the ruck lower then my opponent?
How many ruck penalties did I get dinged for?
Defence
Did you call out 'Guard', '9', '10' consistently?
Did you call out 'Blitz', 'Up & Out', and 'Soft'?
Did you push the man outside you by shifting out and communicating that you were supporting his inside?
Did you keep your feet moving when coming forward on defence?
Did you stay low and explode into the tackle, going from low to high?
Did you stay on your feet if possible, or pop back up to contest quickly?
Did you steal any balls?
Did you suffer any injury?
Please provide a picture of the injury.
Please provide any relevant additional commentary here.
What penalties/infractions did you commit? Select all that apply
What infraction did you commit?
For each penalty you made, describe the events and mental state leading up to and ultimately resulting in the mistake.
Describe context of penalty here:
Please provide your signature
General
Defence
Offense
Preparation
